channel.title: map on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in map on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: Nvidia’s AI-powered scaling makes old games look better without a huge performance hit (3 minute read) Nvidia’s latest game-ready driver includes a tool called Deep Learning Dynamic Super Resolution (DLDSR) that can make most games look sharper.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-03
item.description: Ask Me Anything (TLDR AMA) Hey guys, I am doing an ongoing ask me anything as the first TLDR AMA.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-31
item.description: Nvidia is making a 3D map of the universe with the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer (2 minute read) Nvidia’s Perlmutter supercomputer is the fastest in the world for AI workloads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-10
item.description: Shopify’s payment option to be added to Facebook, Instagram (1 minute read) Shopify is expanding its Shop Pay payment option to all users selling on Facebook and Instagram.
